section.heading: Employee deferred compensation program established.
section.text: There is established an employee deferred compensation program as provided in the Deferred Compensation Act of 1984.

annotations.annotation: as added Sept. 26, 1984, D.C. Law 5-118, § 6(a), 31 DCR 4034
The “Deferred Compensation Act of 1984,” referred to at the end of the section, is D.C. Law 5-118.
Employee deferred compensation program, see § 47-3601 et seq.
